== Introduction ==

This page is a complete list of resources for new users of Lubuntu.

The idea originally created by <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/amjjawad/ | amjjawad]]</nowiki> to have <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1844755 | One Stop Place]]</nowiki> to store everything related to Lubuntu for an easier and a faster access to all Lubuntu Users who seek some help. Since Lubuntu is a Community Project, Lubuntu One Stop Thread (LOST) was converted to a Wiki Page.

Thanks <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/amjjawad/ | amjjawad]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[nothingspecial | nothingspecial]]</nowiki>!
